assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: On behalf of all authors, the corresponding author states that there is no conflict of interest.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This study was approved by the local Biomedical Ethics Committee at the Yakut Scientific Center of Complex Medical Problems, Yakutsk, Russia (Yakutsk, Protocol No. 50, 24 December 2019).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent for genetic analyses was obtained from all individual participants included in this study.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All the authors agreed that this manuscript be submitted to the journal of Human Genetics for publication.
